pages.text: The 'Dark' dungeon is the hardest of the Cubic Dungeons.  All mobs in this dungeon spawn with one ore more Level II effects, such as Absorption II or Strength II.  The magic and redstone themed mobs are vicious and plentiful.  There are many traps, water bucket cheese is penalized, and most of the spawners are inconveniently located.  This dungeon has top tier loot caches.
